import React, { useState } from 'react' import './mainTop.scss' import MainBtn from '../../UI/MainBtn/MainBtn' import ModeBtn from '../../UI/modeBtn/ModeBtn' import UserMenu from '../../UI/UserMenu/UserMenu' import UserModal from '../../UI/UserModal/UserModal' const MainTop = ({ darkMode, setDarkMode, setTaskModal }) => { const [userModal, setUserModal] = useState(false) const btnStyles = { padding: '10px 25px', color: '#fafafa', } return (
setTaskModal(true)}> New task
) } export default MainTop
